archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: (h175) Puzzle
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation: ECR management Should migrate to CorePDM Access database that manages the project associated to each ECR Change database --- Data manipulated: -Effectivity (RBD/RAD/Serie) -CB agenda & MoM, Planning, -Change board MoM (Actions & decisions) -ECR & ECP information -Links between ECPs (joined/prior/incompatible) -SB link -Version (B/B1/Z15) -KPIs --- E2E
